prompts: Create a cheerful Grass-type Pokemon with a round body and leafy accents.
Show me a cute Pokemon that thrives in forests and has bright pink features.
Imagine a small, playful Pokemon with green leaves and a happy expression.
Generate a tiny, berry-themed Pokemon that enjoys sunny grasslands and flowers.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a fruit, complete with vibrant colors and a joyful face.
Make a whimsical creature that loves to play in urban parks, with a friendly demeanor.
Give me a Pokemon that's perfect for kids, featuring soft curves and a bright smile.
